summary: THERE'S A DESIGN FLAW IN VEHICLES' CAP ROTOR DISTRIBUTOR. IT IS LOCATED IN THE BOTTOM OF THE  ENGINE CLOSE TO THE GROUND, SO WHEN VEHICLE IS  BEING DRIVEN IN THE RAIN, WATER GOES INTO THE ROTOR AND MOISTURE  IS ACCUMULATED. THIS RESULTS IN THE VEHICLE STALLING WHILE DRIVING WITHOUT WARNING. MANUFACTURE WAS OF NO ASSISTANCE.*AK
